name: biewer-website
description: Website fÃ¼r die Pension Biewer in Ockfen

scripts.js: mkdir -p public/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/js/bootstrap.min.js && browserify src/js/main.js -o public/js/main.js
scripts.minify: minify public/js/main.js > public/js/main.min.js && rm public/js/main.js && mv public/js/main.min.js public/js/main.js && mkdir -p public/style && lessc --clean-css src/style/style.less public/css/style.css
scripts.dependencies: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/bootstrap.min.css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/js/bootstrap.min.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js public/js/jquery.slim.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js public/js/popper.min.js && mkdir -p public/fonts && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* public/fonts && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css public/css/font-awesome.min.css && cp node_modules/ekko-lightbox/dist/ekko-lightbox.css public/css/ekko-lightbox.css && cp node_modules/ekko-lightbox/dist/ekko-lightbox.js public/js/ekko-lightbox.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap-confirmation2/dist/bootstrap-confirmation.min.js public/js/bootstrap-confirmation.min.js && cp node_modules/cookieconsent/build/cookieconsent.min.js public/js/cookieconsent.min.js && cp node_modules/cookieconsent/build/cookieconsent.min.css public/css/cookieconsent.min.css
scripts.build: npm run debug && npm run minify
scripts.debug: npm run lint && npm run css && npm run js && npm run img && npm run dependencies

author: Marc Hein
